wikipedia_page.main: Peter Davies, a scientist and active researcher, was born in Wales in 1948.  He was the head and director of the Litwin-Zucker Research Center for The Study of Alzheimer's disease and memory disorders associated with The Feinstein Institute for Medical Research in Manhasset, New York, USA.

response: *Peter Davies (politician) (born 1948), British politician, former mayor of Doncaster
*Peter Davies (born 1956), British participant in the Up Series documentaries
*Troy Davies (Peter Davies, 1960–2007), Australian artist and musician
